name: check_equality
description: Create a Scratch program that checks whether the first and last characters of a given string are equal. The sprite should say 'Equal' if they are the same, and 'Not Equal' otherwise.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that checks whether the first and last characters of a given string are equal. The sprite should say 'Equal' if they are the same, and 'Not Equal' otherwise.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: check_equality
